ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The Halley Bay Search Coil Instrument.
ResourceHeader.Description:
The Search Coil instrument recording geomagnetic micropulsation data at
   frequencies less than about 10 Hz at the Halley Bay geomagnetic observatory
   at about 75.6 GLat, 26.3 East Glong.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark J. Engebretson, Augsburg College (2211 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454-1338, USA) for use of data from the Halley Bay SearchCoil instrument.
